name: incremental-topsort
description: Keeps a directed acyclic graph topologically sorted each time you add an edge or vertex.

scripts.test: npx nyc --reporter html --reporter text npx mocha --reporter spec
scripts.doc: npm run doc-create && npm run doc-coverage
scripts.doc-create: npx typedoc --mode file --name js-incremental-topsort --readme README.md --out docs --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --excludeNotExported --excludeProtected --theme minimal main.ts
scripts.doc-coverage: npx nyc --reporter html --report-dir docs/coverage npx mocha --reporter spec
scripts.clean: rm -rf main.js main.d.ts docs/* coverage/* build/* dist.js dist.min.js
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run lint
scripts.build: npm run transpile && npm run browserify && npm run minify && npm run doc

author: Andre Wachsmuth
